conversation.message:
That is a crucial question, Seeker_C, and we believe in transparency regarding expectations. Performance in the first six months is measured primarily through a combination of clear, mutually agreed-upon Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) relevant to your specific project ownership, and qualitative assessments focused on collaboration, learning velocity, and cultural fit. We conduct formal reviews at 90 days and 180 days, supplemented by bi-weekly 1-on-1 feedback sessions with your manager to ensure continuous alignment and support.

Regarding professional development, we allocate an annual stipend of $3,000 for external courses, conferences, or certifications, accessible immediately upon hiring. Furthermore, we run an internal mentorship program pairing new hires with senior leadership across departments, and dedicate Fridays to 'Innovation Time' for skill development or experimental projects. We are heavily invested in ensuring our team members grow rapidly.
